description:
Start your very own blog today! Whether you want to be the next big travel or fashion blogger, promote your business' services or simply share your creative talents and change the world, this course will take you through the beginner's steps to Blogger.

Hi, I'm Liz, a blogger with five to six years of blogging experience, a videographer and photographer! Over the years, I have learnt from experience about setting up, customising and running a blog.

I am going to show you that you do not need to be a high tech coding wiz to start, customise and run a blog. If I could do it, so can you!

At the end of this course, you will

  • Be running and customising the look of your own blog in Blogger, saving you time and money.
  • Know how to add and configure your domain name to your blog. And learn how to come up with a domain name that suits you and your blog.
  • Have a better understanding of Blogger and it's settings.
  • Know where to go to connect with the blogging community that suits you and learn of ways to market and have your blog noticed.
  • Know exactly where to go to easily edit and design your own graphics and photographs.
  • Know where to find free stock images and fonts
  • How you can feature advertisements on your blog and how you can create your own social media buttons.

All of this will be presented to you in easy to follow videos as I will be creating a new blog from scratch with you. I have also included a couple of "Coding cheat sheets" to help you out.

This course is perfect for

  • new bloggers who know what they want to blog about but don't know where or how to begin
  • and for new bloggers who are currently blogging, however want to customise the look of their blog and template but who don't have the time to spend hours researching the change they want or the money to hire someone to make a change for them.
  • and those of you who want to get started on Google's Blogger and are keen to learn some of the ins and outs of the free blogging platform.

You will be able to ask any questions or for any help at any time!

Let's get started on your blog, together!
title: A Beginner's Guide to Blogger
